name: Honeydew
description:
THIS GAME IS STILL IN VERY EARLY DEVELOPMENT. CHECK THE DEVLOG ON WHAT IS TO BE/HAS BEEN IMPLEMENTED BEFORE INSTALLING.

Honeydew is a bittersweet slice-of-life revolving around the life of two highschoolers: Damien and Alex. Follow their friendship, love life and maybe shed some tears with them too! There are two routes you'll be able to pick, each of them change depending on your choices. So choose wisely!

*Game has swearing and triggering themes. Do not play if you're under 13 or sensitive.

The game is currently in early development, and so we are using creative commons. The sprites are by EmbraceOfDestiny and the backgrounds by Uncle Mugen.

If you find any bugs, typos or feedback in general, feel free to type it in the comments! Any creative criticism would be appreciated.
